body.p: Be it remembered that heretofore to wit: on the 15 day of Oct 1865 the following Indictment was found by the grand Jury of Mercer County Ky to wit:

The Commonwealth of Kentucky
against } Mercer County Circuit Court
John Hudson

The Grand Jury of Mercer County in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky accuse --
John Hudson
of the offence of Grand Larceny committed as follows the said John Hudson in the 1st day of July 1863 in the county aforesaid, did unlawfully and feloniously steal, take and carry away one horse beast of value of seventy five dollars of the personal property of William Hickman agaisnt the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Witnesses before the Jury
Harvey Cunningham S D Ervin
W H Hawkins N E Clelland
James Nichols
James Currens
W B Hickman
L H Noble Attorney for the Commonwealth
upon the Back of the foregoing are the following endorsements to wit:
A true Bill William Daviess foreman of Grand Jury

A Copy Attest
Richard Board clk

The Commwth
vs } Copy Indict
John Hudson
For Deft
Fee.50

Mercer Cir Ct
vs
John Hudson
Pardoned
10th Aug 1865
